akn:content.akn:p:
§ 225. Federal reserve banks; title A Federal reserve bank shall include in its title the name of the city in which it is situated, as “Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago.” (Dec. 23, 1913, ch. 6, § 2 (part), 38 Stat. 252.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section is based on part of the second par. of section 2 of act Dec. 23, 1913. The rest of the second par. was not included in the Code. For classification of other pars. of section 2 of this Act, see Codification note set out under section 222 of this title.
